clinical_history: Patient presents with abdominal discomfort and bloating.
technique: High-resolution linear and curvilinear probes used for detailed evaluation.
findings: No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Liver appears ill-defined with no focal lesions.
Major vessels show hypoechoic waveform on Doppler.
Right kidney demonstrates coarse, no hydronephrosis.
Breast tissue shows well-defined lesion measuring 35.49 mm.
impression: Appearance concerning for possible malignancy—correlate clinically.
recommendations: Refer to specialist for further evaluation.
